pr_title: refactor: break up InsertValuesExecutor for easier reuse in testing tool

replies.bodyText: done, I left it package private so that I could just copy it over from what it was - but I agree with you that this is cleaner.

timeline.bodyText: wonder if this is a common enough pattern to warrant a singular CodeGenRunner.compileExpression helper method...

timeline.bodyText: Can the code be enhanced to throw on a column reference? Or does it already?
